   X-Men (2000)
   -Plot Summary-
   Amid increasing fear and bigotry, Professor Charles Xavier provides a 
   safe haven for powerful outcasts like Wolverine, Rogue, and Storm, who 
   are genetically gifted mutants; and the world's newest, most persecuted 
   minority group. In an explosive battle for freedom and honor, the X-Men 
   take on Magneto and his band of evil mutants, who despise humanity and 
   relish the public's paranoia...
